description: 4 year cyclical Tree works to establish and maintain a 2m clearance between all trees and buildings, signage, lighting and CCTV cameras as identified on the attached plans, and to allow lifting to 5m over internal roads to allow bus/lorry access and 3m above footpaths with all cuts being made to suitable growth points.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
